block.p: Because of the Greek Independence Day Parade, Fifth Avenue will be closed today from 62d to 79th Streets from 1 P.M. to 6 P.M.

Because of construction activity, the Park Avenue Tunnel from 33d to 40th Street will be closed from 9:30 A.M. to 3:30 P.M. for two weeks beginning tomorrow. Motorists are advised to use Lexington and Third Avenues as alternate routes.
